name: LD to Git
overview: Send LaunchDarkly flag changes to Git.
description: This integration sends LaunchDarkly audit log events to git repository
author: LaunchDarkly

formVariables.name: Git repo URL
formVariables.description: Enter the URL for your target repository

formVariables.name: Authentication token
formVariables.description: Enter the [base64 _credentials_ based on your API Key]

formVariables.name: branch
formVariables.description: Enter the branch name where you want to commit flags
